name: Sonic Blast Man
overview: His Body Is A Lethal Weapon! The Sonic Blast Man is highly skilled in all forms of physical combat. With this Dynamite Punches, Flip Kicks, Judo Throws, and other fighting techniques, he uses his body to thrash enemies. As he travels around Earth and on a Space Station, he will be challenged by hundreds of human, robot, and alien foes! The Blast Man faces adventures that will push him to the limits of his skill--and beyond!
